main event: An unidentified object was observed in Los Alamos, New Mexico on 11 June 1949.
interesting points: The object changed color from green to red at the end of its flight,The object appeared to climb sharply before falling almost straight down,The object was observed for approximately 4 to 5 seconds,The observer believed the object was not a meteor due to its color and flight path,The object left a short red tail during its flight.
